We are given publickey and C


Converting Encrypted text to decimal. 

By using https://www.dcode.fr/rsa-cipher We can get n and e by entering the publickey.

```
n = 
```

### e = 65537

Using https://www.alpertron.com.ar/ECM.HTM We can find p,q using n.

```
p = 
```

```
q = 
```

```py
import gmpy2
import codecs

if __name__ == '__main__':
    n = 
    e = 65537
    c = 

    p = 
    q = 
    
    l = gmpy2.lcm(p-1, q-1)
    gcd, u, v = gmpy2.gcdext(e, l)

    while u < 0:
        u += l
    m = pow(c, u, n)
    print(m)
    print(codecs.decode(('%x'%m),'hex_codec'))
```
